channel.title: Repos got messed up, errors when updating
channel.description:
I did not update Kicksecure in a long time because I was in
[details="Summary"] rehab for a very serious addiction to mushrooms, alcohol, and heroin
[/details]
a long vacation. When I got back, nothing worked at all for sudo apt-update && sudo apt-upgrade with multiple time out errors and unable to connect to repo errors.
I sometimes use Kicksecure in a virt-manager connected to whonix gateway. I am not sure if this is the problem. (Yes, it is connected to 10.152.152.X and I can browse)
I made the mistake of going into etc/apt and just randomly deleting and modifying things, figuring the bookworm stuff was the problem. Now it seems like a mess and I don’t know what to do.
I know I can choose stable/beta from the Repository application and tried to do that already.
Does anyone have a list of what should be in /etc/apt?

item.title: Repos got messed up, errors when updating
item.dc:creator: zelig
item.description:
Is this because it’s trying to update via tor and then trying to create tor over tor connections?

When I get the error I see this message:

0% [Connecting to SOCKS5h proxy (socks5h://127.0.0.1:9050)]

I also get errors like:

po_kicksecure.sources:1
W: Target Packages (main/binary-amd64/Packages) is configured multiple times in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list:18 and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/extrepo_kicksecure.sources:1
W: Target Packages (main/binary-all/Packages) is configured multiple times in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list:18 and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/extrepo_kicksecure.sources:1
W: Target DEP-11 (main/dep11/Components-amd64.yml) is configured multiple times in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list:18 and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/extrepo_kicksecure.sources:1
W: Target DEP-11 (main/dep11/Components-all.yml) is configured multiple times in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list:18 and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/extrepo_kicksecure.sources:1
W: Target DEP-11-icons-small (main/dep11/icons-48x48.tar) is configured multiple times in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list:18 and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/extrepo_kicksecure.sources:1
W: Target DEP-11-icons (main/dep11/icons-64x64.tar) is configured multiple times in /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list:18 and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/extrepo_kicksecure.sources:1

Read full topic
item.source: Repos got messed up, errors when updating
